title: Magic Power Potion
summaries: The Magic Power Potion is a buff potion which grants the Magic Power buff when consumed. The buff increases damage done by magic weapons by 20%.

This lasts for 4 minutes / 2 minutes, but can be canceled at any time by right-clicking the icon ([img:Desktop version] [img:Legacy tModLoader version]), by selecting the icon and canceling it in the equipment menu ([img:Console version] [img:Old-gen console version]), by double-tapping the buff icon ([img:Mobile version]), or by canceling the buff from the buffs screen ([img:Nintendo 3DS version]). The buff stacks with any bonuses granted from equipped armor.
The Magic Power Potion can be crafted, but can also be found in <linked>Shadow Chests</linked> and <linked>Pots</linked> in the <linked>Underworld</linked>.
